attributes.action: Establish an official tribute memorial garden for George Michael in Highgate.
attributes.additional_details: George Michael was as a singer, songwriter, record producer, entertainer and philanthropist.  He has sold 115 million records world wide, making him one of the best-selling music artists of all time.During the period of 1984-2004, the Radio Academy named him the most played artist on British radio. A British citizen, his musical contributions and generous donations to various charities including a free concert for NHS nurses in 2006 make him worthy of a dedicated garden where fans can honor him.
attributes.background: His contributions qualify him to be recognized by the public & government to receive a dedication plaque and designated tribute/memorial garden where fans can pay their respects.  It is suggested that the public/green space opposite his Highgate home be used. suggested name; George’s Garden.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The decision to build a memorial garden in Highgate would be one for the local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
